sentences.english: His poems on wine vessels were important components of his poetry.
sentences.chinese: 觴詠詩是其詩歌文學的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: Dye was three thousand white and welcome the tangerine sunset, full order chaos down dark glass.
sentences.chinese: 染卻三千白髮又迎菊色夕陽，滿階亂落暗觴。

sentences.english: Your future depends on your dreams. " so go to sleep."
sentences.chinese: “你的未來取泀於你的夢想”，所以趕快去睡觴吧。
